item.title: Why You Can Never Get Good Seats at Concerts
item.description: Have you tried to buy concert tickets lately? Once you get past the sticker shock of how much a ticket will cost you, especially with the fees, you can then enjoy the frustration of trying to find seats. Good seats. And you won’t find many. Here’s six reasons why. And that’s why I only go see shows at clubs.
